# Time Warp IDE v5.0.1

Patch release after v5.0.0.

Changes:
- Follow-up cleanup to streamline runtime
- Confirmed removal of legacy platforms, tests, helper scripts
- Updated documentation/version refs to v5.0.1 where applicable

Runtime notes:
- Core GUI remains PySide6
- Entry points unchanged (Time_Warp_IDE.py, run.sh)
